name: Command & Conquer 4: Tiberian Twilight
description: Behold disciples of Nod, for the end is soon upon us. Electronic Arts’ award-winning and best-selling Tiberium saga is coming to a powerful conclusion with Command & Conquer 4, which will introduce a multitude of innovations to the classic fast and fluid Command & Conquer gameplay, while retaining the core compulsions that fans...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista SP1, or Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 or better, AMD 64 X2 or better Memory: 1 GB (1.5 GB Vista and Windows 7) Hard Drive: At least 10 GB of free space Graphics: 256 MB (SM 3.0) - Nvidia GeForce 6800 or better, ATI Radeon X1600 or better Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.6 GHz; AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual-Core 5600+ Memory: 2GB Graphics: 256 MB (SM 3.0) - Nvidia GeForce 8800 or better, ATI X1900 or better

reviews.review_text: TL;DR? See Conclusion

This game virtually forces you to play with other people in multiplayer online. The moment you launch, you are immediately connected to a chat full of testosterone powered 12 year olds typing obscenities and insults to eachother and being racist, sexist, and other types of -ist. I tried this game for awhile, and finagled myself into a CPU only match but it was a big hassle and the gameplay is not as satisfying as the previous titles. I do not recommend this to fans of the series. I would only buy this game if you are also a hormone fuled 12 year old looking to embarass other kids online.
That was just terrible. hate the game mechanics. liked the old rts base building engine, not the 'one building make all' kind this game had.
EA's Failed experiment.  I don't like it, the older ones are better.
This is _not_ a command and conquer game. It's an effort to cash in on the franchise. Avoid.
This Game Has bene spolied, once a FANTASIC building base stat game, now a carppy mobile fortress Bs.
Can't even play it. The login is not working even though I put in the right password and there's no password reset in the log in menu. This is stupid. At least I only wasted $5 during a sale.

Someone needs to be fired over this mess. I loved the series up until #4. Everything I liked was stripped out in favor of...well total crap really. The graphics and sound are nice, I can say that. Base building? Gone. Stupid mobile all in one bases? Added. Fun? A thing of the past.
Let's take a well versed system of building a base... and change it... This is not like previous C&C... /yawn
Why would you ruin such a great game
Highly recommended for people who love to torture themselves.

Terrible, obliteration of the command and conquer series. Destroyed all my hopes and dreams and ruined my childhood. abysmal, dismal attempt at remodelling the series, destroyed all it stood for. It hurt and killed me inside. EA seem to ruin everything they touch. First red alert 3, then this... why...?

A once proud RTS series, reduced to a pathetic game of rock-paper scissors, with no tactics other then what counters what, and no resource management or base building. The only thing Tiberian Twilight has in common with the earlier entries in the series, even with the third game, is the presence of Joe Kucan as Kane- and the dead, empty look in his eyes tells you what you need to know. Avoid this game at all costs.
Very bad game, avoid at all costs if you actually enjoy and respect the RTS genre.
Way to ♥♥♥♥ing ruin the series...
Worst game I have ever played. Would not even pirate this crap... waste of space and time.
Literally the worst game I've ever played in my life. Probably gave me cancer.
just straight up disapointment in a bag of ♥♥♥♥.
Not like the rest of C&C series. Not sure I can even play through this game. Major annoyances for anyone who is a fan of the original C&C games.

Terrible. Absolutely the worst C&C game ever made, without a doubt, I don't know how EA could make C&C 3 so incredibly amazing and then do a couplete U-turn and make this. This may well be the worst game I have ever had the misfortune to play. I paid under £5 for this and it was still too much. I feel like EA should be paying us to play this. The 'always-online' that EA has a big hard-on for lately is a nightmare. The only reason I bought this was to concluce the CnC tiberium storyline and even that was terrible. Did you know there's no more tiberium in this game? Literally, it's pretty much all gone. No base building, no harvesting resources. You can train units without any cost but only up to a very, very limited unit cap. I'm talking REAL limited. Like you can only train enough units to have a decent attack force or a decent defense force. Not both. I expect that kind of limit on a console RTs but not PC.  DO NOT BUY
The worst CnC game i have ever played they have potentially ruined the franchise
Shockingly bad. Dirties the CnC name. Glitches from the word go. Feels like a EA tried to rip of StarCraft and failed badly.

I dont like to give bad reviews but this game just dosent even come close to 'Command & Conqurer 3' this game always felt severely lacking and I was hoping the story would compell me to keep playing but it just killed it for me.

EA screwed up big time on this one.  They failed the developers who had built an moderately interesting fast-paced RTS game that really had nothing to do with C&C and slapped the brand name on it, hoping it might sell to some hardcore C&C fans. The game itself never got the chance it might have deserved, because it could never be judged on its own merits but always as 'The Conclusion to the Tiberium Saga'. They failed the fans of the previous games, because they delivered something that did not understand the value of the gameplay of all the previous titles and threw out time-honored traditions just for the sake of cleaning house. They even managed to fail the brand itself. If EA has to send out an email that ensures 'fans' that they have brought back resource harvesting, removed unit caps and similar basic fundamantals, then it is very clear that the brand itself have lost tremendous value and C&C4 almost solely bears that whole responsibility. Overall this game fails, not because of what it is, but for what it sets out to be.
i have never seen a more stupid RTS games than this one
When a friend of mine got this for me, I was expecting the usual rts style of gameplay. It's clear that I did not get this, and playing this was excruciatingly painful.
For the love of God do not buy this game.
Don't buy this game

As a fan of the original Tiberian Sun C&C game I expected this remake to be at least as good as the original. It is TERRIBLE!!!! The fun in C&C games, because they seem not to have understood it, is to be able to build strong defenses and large bases, outposts and a solid economy ?!? With the machanics of this version, it is absolutly IMPOSSIBLE to accomplish, at all!!! This thing with the crystals to gain access to slight advantages absolutly sucks. You need to play many hours before gaining access to 50% of the units available using only boring to play and weak mech_infantry units. From my point of view, they would rather keep the unit layouts and apply the game mechanics of the provious version... At least it would be playable. What a rubbish!!! DO NOT BUY THAT, unless 1-2$, very frustrating game!!!
This is the worst video game I have ever played.

♥♥♥♥ YOU EA...♥♥♥♥ YOU FOR ♥♥♥♥ING UP ORIGINAL GAME COMPANIES...♥♥♥♥ YOU USLESS ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ ♥♥♥ BAGS THAT THINK FOR A MINUET YOUR RELEASING QUALITY....YOUR BETTER OFF STICKING TO THOSE LAME AS RERENDERED SPORTS FRANCHISES THAT YOU ALL LIKE TO ♥♥♥♥ UP...EA...JUST ♥♥♥♥ING GO IN A CORNER AND ♥♥♥♥ING DIE
DONT BUY THIS! the reason why is because the servers are broken and dont work
Games pretty ♥♥♥♥♥♥, no base construction involved. Wish they didn't make this a ♥♥♥♥♥♥ game, horrible way to end the series. Leave it up to EA to ruin great franchises.
What a shame !

Not only is this game the biggest piece of rubbish ever created, but it does one of the most unethical things. After exiting the game it keeps itself 'running' on steam to falsely increase the hours played. I played this for only 30 minutes and it says 95 hours now.  Avoid this junk like the plague. It is poorly put together and has no bearing on the command and conquer universe. This game is honestly worse quality than bad cell phone games.  A total rip-off. Useless. Rubbish. Junk. No redeeming feature whatsoever. Trash. Excrement. Makes me want to vomit.  0 / 10
This isn't an RTS this belongs in something like starcraft arcade or something
Not as good as number 3. But the new gameplay was interesting so it was still fun.
Doesn't feel like a Command and Conquer game at all.
Played for 2 seconds, uninstalled.
No clue how to play this!!! No base building....
Terrible. Can't even build a base
Can't create a new account to login because the page no longer exists.
One of the worst games I have had the misfortune of playing.   The videos got me all hyped up. I bought this near to release. Feel ripped off and like EA have done a massive turd on me.
i dont care about what any one has to say about this game ive always been a fan and i relley wish their were a few more games in the secrice
you wouldn't want to buy this even at 75% off, this game sucks. they fail very badly trying to to immitate DOW
